Node èŠ‚ç‚¹ç±»
12345678910class Node {    constructor(val = 0, next = null, prev = null) {        // é“¾è¡¨æ•°æ®åŸŸ        this.val = val        // é“¾è¡¨æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸ        this.next = next        // é“¾è¡¨æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸï¼ˆåŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ï¼‰        this.prev = prev    }}
Single Linked List å•å‘é“¾è¡¨ç±»
123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124class SingleLinkedList {    #head    #currentNode    #size    constructor(head = 'head') {        // è¡¨å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹        this.#head = new Node(head)        // å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹        this.#currentNode = this.#head        // é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦        this.#size = 0    }    // æŸ¥æ‰¾ val èŠ‚ç‚¹    find (val) {        this.#currentNode = this.#head        while (this.#currentNode && this.#currentNode.val !== val) {            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next        }        return this.#currentNode    }    // æŸ¥æ‰¾æœ€åæ·»åŠ çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹    findLasst () {        this.#currentNode = this.#head        while (this.#currentNode.next) {            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next        }        return this.#currentNode    }    // åœ¨ prevNode ä¹‹åæ’å…¥ val èŠ‚ç‚¹    insert (val, prevNode) {        this.#currentNode = this.find(prevNode)        if (!this.#currentNode) return console.error(`${prevNode} is undefined`)        val = new Node(val)        val.next = this.#currentNode.next        this.#currentNode.next = val        this.#size++    }    // åœ¨é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ  val èŠ‚ç‚¹    append (val) {        this.#currentNode = this.findLasst()        this.#currentNode.next = new Node(val)        this.#size++    }    // ç§»é™¤ val èŠ‚ç‚¹    remove (val) {        // ç§»é™¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨        if (!this.find(val)) return        // ç§»é™¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºè¡¨å¤´çš„æƒ…å†µ        // é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ä¸ä¸º 0 æ—¶ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›ï¼›è‹¥åˆ é™¤è¡¨å¤´ï¼Œåˆ™å°†æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¯¥é“¾è¡¨çš„å…¥å£        // é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ä¸º 0 æ—¶ï¼Œå°†è¡¨å¤´çš„ next æŒ‡é’ˆç½®ç©º        if (val === this.#head.val) {            if (!this.isEmpty()) {                return            } else {                this.#head.next = null                this.#size = 0                return            }        }        this.#currentNode = this.#head        while (this.#currentNode.next.val !== val) {            if (!this.#currentNode.next) return            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next        }        this.#currentNode.next = this.#currentNode.next.next        this.#size--    }    // é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º    isEmpty () {        return this.#size === 0    }    // æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹    show () {        console.log(this.#currentNode?.val)    }    // è·å–é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦    getLength () {        return this.#size    }    // èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆä» currentNode ä½ç½®ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤è¡¨å¤´ï¼‰å‰è¿› num ä½    forward (num, start) {        this.#currentNode = start ? this.find(start) : this.#currentNode        while (num-- && this.#currentNode?.next) {            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next        }        return this.#currentNode    }    // è¿”å›è¡¨å¤´    goToHead () {        this.#currentNode = this.#head    }    // éå†æ˜¾ç¤ºé“¾è¡¨    display () {        let result = ''        this.#currentNode = this.#head        while (this.#currentNode) {            result += this.#currentNode.val            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next            if (this.#currentNode) result += '->'        }        console.log(result)    }    // æ¸…ç©ºé“¾è¡¨    clear () {        this.#head.next = null        this.#currentNode = this.#head        this.#size = 0    }}
Double Linked List åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ç±»
 DoubleLinkedList {    #head    #tail    #currentNode    #size    constructor (head = 'head') {        this.#head = new Node(head)        // è¡¨å°¾        this.#tail = this.#head        this.#currentNode = this.#head        this.#size = 0    }    find (val) {        this.#currentNode = this.#head        while (this.#currentNode && this.#currentNode.val !== val) {            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next        }        return this.#currentNode    }    showLast () {        return this.#tail    }    insert (val, prevNode) {        // preNode ä¸ºæœ«å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æƒ…å†µ        if (prevNode === this.#tail.val) {            this.#currentNode = new Node(val)            this.#tail.next = this.#currentNode            this.#currentNode.prev = this.#tail            this.#tail = this.#currentNode            this.#size++            return        }        this.#currentNode = this.find(prevNode)        if (!this.#currentNode) return console.error(`${prevNode} is undefined`)        val = new Node(val)        val.prev = this.#currentNode        val.next = this.#currentNode.next        this.#currentNode.next = val        this.#size++    }    append (val) {        this.#currentNode = new Node(val)        this.#tail.next = this.#currentNode        this.#currentNode.prev = this.#tail        this.#tail = this.#currentNode        this.#size++    }    remove (val) {        // val èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºæœ«å°¾çš„æƒ…å†µ        if (val === this.#tail.val) {            this.#currentNode = this.#tail.prev            this.#currentNode.next = null            this.#size--            return        }        if (val === this.#head.val) {            if (!this.isEmpty()) {                return            } else {                this.head.next = null                this.#size = 0                return            }        }        this.#currentNode = this.find(val)        // ç§»é™¤çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨        if (!this.#currentNode) return        this.#currentNode.next.prev = this.#currentNode.prev        this.#currentNode.prev.next = this.#currentNode.next        this.#size--    }    forward (num, start) {        this.#currentNode = start ? this.find(start) : this.#currentNode        while (num-- && this.#currentNode?.next) {            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next        }        return this.#currentNode    }    back (num, start) {        this.#currentNode = start ? this.find(start) : this.#currentNode        while (num-- && this.#currentNode?.prev) {            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.prev        }        return this.#currentNode    }    goToHead () {        this.#currentNode = this.#head    }    goToTail () {        this.#currentNode = this.#tail    }    isEmpty () {        return this.#size === 0    }    show () {        console.log(this.#currentNode?.val)    }    getLength () {        return this.#size    }    display () {        let result = ''        this.#currentNode = this.#head        while (this.#currentNode) {            result += this.#currentNode.val            this.#currentNode = this.#currentNode.next            if (this.#currentNode) result += '->'        }        console.log(result)    }    clear () {        this.#head.next = null        this.#tail = this.#head        this.#currentNode = this.#head        this.#size = 0    }}
